name: Silver Bubble
description: Silver Bubble is a supreme hybrid; a compelling mix of Haze, Northern Lights, and Skunk bred by DNA Genetics. It is a strain with a heavy Haze influence and has become a mainstay at the Amsterdam coffee shops, specifically Grey Area. Silver Bubble is a timeless Dutch strain that provides well-rounded effects and an aroma spiced with sandalwood.Â
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Sleepy, Uplifted, Euphoric, Stress, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Depression, Pain, Dizzy, Headache, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid
